detaileddescription.para:
Present a file open dialog to the user let them select a configuration file on success enable config menu options and disable file menu options.

briefdescription.para: Display XML document formated in text display.

briefdescription.para: Display XML document formated in text display as a dot conf.

detaileddescription.para:
Open the XSLT file to transform to .conf and apply it to the XML document placing the output in a text panel.

Openand apply the XSLT xml2conf.xsl and save the result to a file selected in a file dialog.
